name: Obscurity
detailed_description:
Welcome to a dark but warm world! Obscurity is a small 2D game where the objective will be to deliver your little creature!
Obscurity will put your logic to the test! Progress in 15 different unique levels with a special atmosphere ...
Are you ready to guide your little ball of hair towards the light?



Features:

■ Very nice atmosphere!
■ 15 unique levels!
■ Little relaxing game!
■ Very nice 2D decorations!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphique
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All
